Rulings.HAT:
● You can only "use" one of these effects per turn.
This means that, even if the activation or effect of one of these effects was negated, you still can't activate any of the others that turn.

PSCT.Vegas:
① You can banish 2 other monsters (EARTHs and/or Dragons) from your hand and/or GY; 
Special Summon this card from your hand/GY. 
② During your opponent's End Phase, if this card was Special Summoned: Return it to the hand. 
③ If this card is banished: You can add 1 EARTH Dragon from your Deck to your hand. 
④ You can discard this card and 1 EARTH to the GY, then target 1 monster in your GY; Special Summon it.
(You can only use 1 "Redox, Dragon Ruler of Boulders" effect per turn, and only once that turn).

PSCT.Base: If this card is in your hand or Graveyard: You can banish a total of 2 EARTH and/or Dragon-Type monsters from your hand and/or Graveyard, except this card; Special Summon this card. During your opponent's End Phase, if this card was Special Summoned: Return it to the hand. You can discard this card and 1 EARTH monster to the Graveyard, then target 1 monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target. If this card is banished: You can add 1 EARTH Dragon-Type monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use 1 "Redox, Dragon Ruler of Boulders" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
